predicate.note: Frames file for 'avoid' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus.

example.name: NP thing avoided
example.text: She wanted *trace* to avoid the morale-damaging public disclosure that a trial would bring.
example.arg: the morale-damaging public disclosure that a trial would bring.

example.name: S thing avoided
example.text: Mr. Stoll wanted *trace-1* to avoid *trace-2* arousing suspicion.
